description: This solicitation is for the purchase of Symantec Support.

full_summary:
# Solicitation for Symantec Support

## Tender Overview

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a Solicitation No. BPM018327/22035 for the provision of Symantec Support services. The solicitation, which is open to both domestic and international suppliers, has a closing date of March 17th, 2023, at 14:00:00.

## Tender Details

* **Reference No.**: SSC-23-00022035:T
* **Amendment No.**: 3
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the solicitation documents and attachments, can be accessed via the SSC P2P portal at the following URLs:

* English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/ED2FB072-F059-44DB-BF05-F8F8B9FC86D8, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/238D7629-972B-4B4B-8120-53B4C2991D89
* French: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/1188D037-8985-41DF-BF95-F9A52C53EC65, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/FA89E6C9-B394-4FF2-9DCB-FE930C90733A

## Tender Description

The SSC is seeking to purchase Symantec Support services. Suppliers can register in the SSC P2P portal to access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and be awarded contracts.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this solicitation, please contact Clara Whittaker, SSC, at:

* Email: clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-553-8354
* Fax: 343-553-8354
